dct_description_sm: Relief shown by contours and spot heights.
Covers area south of Hanka Lake.
Includes index to adjoining sheets in margins.
Note on right margin states that map was assembled from Shiberi jūmanbun no ichi zu at the request of Army Staff College (Rikugun Daigakkō).
In Japanese; place names in Japanese and Russian.
Facsim. of ed. publ.: [Tokyo? : Sanbō Honbu?], 1937.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
